title: Your Guide to Managing Your Subscriptions
excerpt: Subscriptions are a big part of modern life—think Netflix, Spotify, gym memberships, or work tools like Canva or Notion. They’re convenient, but those “set it and forget it” payments can add up fast if you’re not paying attention.
